elements.name: As a user of ngfp awareness application I need to make sure that awareness table content can be refreshed

steps.name: I am on the "awareness" page
I hover the mouse over "Refresh button" element
the element: "Refresh tooltip" is visible on the page
I click the "Refresh button" button
the element: "Flights loader spinner" is visible on the page

elements.name: As a user of ngfp awareness application I need to make sure that upon clicking status filter status buttons are present

steps.name: I am on the "awareness" page
I click the "Filter" button with parameter "Plan"
the element: "Status label" with value "Plan" is visible on the page
the element: "Yellow status filter" with value "Plan" is visible on the page
the element: "Red status filter" with value "Plan" is visible on the page

elements.name: As a user of ngfp awareness application I need to make sure that search function returns requested kanban element

steps.name: I am on the "awareness" page
I fill in the "Search" input with "red_status"
the element: "Kanban card" with value "red_status" is visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "yellow_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "green_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "white_status" is not visible on the page

elements.name: As a user of ngfp awareness application I need to make sure that "yellow status" filter function returns requested kanban elements

steps.name: I am on the "awareness" page
I click the "Filter" button with parameter "Plan"
I click the "Yellow status filter" button with parameter "Plan"
the "Yellow status filter" "aria-selected" attribute should contain the text "true"
the element: "Kanban card" with value "yellow_status" is visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "red_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "green_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "white_status" is not visible on the page

elements.name: As a user of ngfp awareness application I need to make sure that "red status" filter function returns requested kanban elements

steps.name: I am on the "awareness" page
I click the "Filter" button with parameter "Plan"
I click the "Red status filter" button with parameter "Plan"
the "Red status filter" "aria-selected" attribute should contain the text "true"
the element: "Kanban card" with value "red_status" is visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "yellow_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "green_status" is not visible on the page
the element: "Kanban card" with value "white_status" is not visible on the page
